description: A Kotlin source file defining the MainActivity class for an Android application built with Flutter. The class extends FlutterActivity to serve as the main entry point for the Flutter app on Android.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main entry Activity for the Flutter application on Android. Extends FlutterActivity, utilizing Flutter Embedding v2 without additional overrides.

methods.name: MainActivity
methods.description: Constructor for MainActivity class; inheriting default behavior from FlutterActivity, serving as the main entry point for the app.
